# Corvus Star: Project Structure Map

> **The World Tree (Yggdrasil)**
> This document maps the physical structure of the Corvus Star framework.

## Root Directory

- `src/`: Core source code (The Trunk)
- `tests/`: Unified test suite (The Roots)
- `docs/`: Documentation (The Leaves)
- `.agent/`: Agent configuration and memory (The Mind)
- `.github/`: CI/CD workflows (The Guardians)
- `pyproject.toml`: Central configuration (The Law)

## Source Tree (`src/`)

### Core (`src/core/`)
The brain of the operation.
- `sv_engine.py`: Sovereign Vector Engine (Entry Point)
- `cstar_dispatcher.py`: CLI Command Dispatcher
- `personas.py`: Identity management
- `ui/`: Terminal User Interface (HUD)
- `engine/`:
  - `vector.py`: Intent resolution logic
  - `cortex.py`: Deep thought processing
  - `dialogue.py`: Speech generation

### Sentinel (`src/sentinel/`)
The autonomous daemon.
- `main_loop.py`: The heartbeat loop
- `sovereign_fish.py`: Autonomy logic

### Tools (`src/tools/`)
Utility belts and diagnostics.
- `code_sentinel.py`: Static analysis
- `debug/`: Diagnostic scripts
- `data/`: Data manipulation tools

### Synapse (`src/synapse/`)
Connectivity layer.
- `synapse_sync.py`: Knowledge synchronization
- `synapse_auth.py`: Authentication

### Skills (`src/skills/`)
Capability modules.
- `local/`: Built-in skills
- `skill_forge/`: Skill creation tools

### Data (`src/data/`)
Static assets.
- `thesaurus.qmd`: Intent mapping
- `stopwords.json`: NLP filtering
- `dialogue/`: Persona voice files

## Test Tree (`tests/`)

- `unit/`: Isolated module tests
- `integration/`: System-wide tests (`fishtest.py`)
- `contracts/`: Interface enforcement
- `fixtures/`: Test data

## Documentation (`docs/`)

- `architecture/`: System design docs
